This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vk.com/im?peers=350524786_191872116_59974911_c168_116913520_c219_107207949_c179&sel=c154&t2fs=9825e49ad6c8c59f94_2](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com%2Fim%3Fpeers%3D350524786_191872116_59974911_c168_116913520_c219_107207949_c179%26sel%3Dc154%26t2fs%3D9825e49ad6c8c59f94_2) ### Comment > При включенном AdGuard-долго грузится Вконтакте,не отображаются значки диалогов и невозможно войти в сами диалоги. Так же я не успела,но при обновлении страницы сегодня вылезло сообщение,в котором говорилось, что из-за устаревшей версии AdGuard, страница может работать неккореткно,но никаких уведомлений о необходимости обновлений мне не приходило. > При отключенном AdGuard как видно из скриншота, все просто крашится и Вконтакте вообще отказывается работать. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Astoundingly, that domain has *[thirty thousand subdomains](https://securitytrails.com/list/apex_domain/ondigitalocean.app)*, all of which are used for malware.

I'd say this warrants a `||ondigitalocean.app^$all` entry, to say it the least.

comment.body:
The error is cosmetic; it does not affect play.

After further troubleshooting, this seems to be a DNS glitch, not a filter issue.

I had this enabled:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/494022/179418794-cffa5b2a-d93b-4e61-885c-9b22ca6d695a.png)

Disabling AdGuard DNS resolves the glitch on Windows 11 even if all filters are enabled.

This means that the corresponding glitch on CrOS is likely a separate issue.

issue.title: RFE/C: Use tools to wholesale block highly-suspect TLDs
issue.body:
_N.B.: Not using template, as it doesn't seem to relate to suggestions.  If I missed something, I apologize! 🙇_

@AdguardTeam https://krebsonsecurity.com/2018/06/bad-men-at-work-please-dont-click/ & comments lists some tools that, w/ _very_ high probability, identify [TLDs](https://www.icann.org/registrar-reports/accredited-list.html) that are almost exclusively used for malware/spam/&c.:

- [ ] https://www.spamhaus.org/statistics/tlds/
- [ ] https://www.symantec.com/blogs/feature-stories/top-20-shady-top-level-domains & linked

There also seems to be a high correlation of NameCheap-registered TLDs w/ malware/&c, but that may be something handled better via AGDNS.

What d'y'all think?

comment.body: I ran into this again.  Was there any further discussion, especially re: SpamHaus's TLD (& other linked) tools?
